title: I just don't understand and i'm a bit tilted
body: [](http://i.imgur.com/t79pl09.png) this is the clipnotes version of a game i just had and iv had many like it on Sivir but no matter what i do i cant get it to budge over to S- if i play more for kills i get A+ if i play more to the objectives like i did this game i get an A+ i have no idea what i'm doing wrong, iv been told i need at least 200 cs but iv gotten that before and with a better kda then this game. i'm only bronze but i feel like i should know why i haven't been able to budge that over to S-. and just encase the link didn't work here it is again  http://i.imgur.com/t79pl09.png

replies.body: There's a small tidbit of mastery scores that most people tend to forget about: Mastery Scores take into account how well you're doing in that lane with that champion compared to everyone else who was playing the same lane and champ. Essentially, an S score means you've placed in the higher percentile of players. If you aren't getting S's, it means you haven't been performing as well as some others.
Ok thanks that might explain it
